* Based on the Koukaku Kidoutai manga by Shirow Masamune.

It is 2027, a year after the end of the non-nuclear World War IV. A bomb has gone off in Newport City,
killing a major arms dealer who may have had ties with the mysterious 501 Organization. Public Security
official Aramaki Daisuke hires full-body cyber prosthesis user and hacker extraordinaire Kusanagi Motoko
to investigate. Working on the case with her are: "Sleepless Eyes" Batou, who believes Motoko is a
criminal; Niihama Prefecture Police Detective Togusa, who is investigating a series of prostitute murders
he believes are related to the incident; and Lieutenant Colonel Kurutsu of the 501 Organization, who also
wishes to keep an eye on Motoko. Meanwhile, bits of the past of the members of
this new Public Security organization, Section 9, begin to surface.


VIDEO
- Video Source: BD-J
- Video Codec: H.264/AVC
- Video Resolution: 1280x720p HD (16:9)
- Video FPS: 23.976

AUDIO
- Codec: AAC
- Track 1: English: 5.1ch
- Track 2: Japanese: 5.1ch

SUBTITLES
- Track 1: English Signs/Songs
- Track 2: English Subtitles
